Regression modeling

Circular economy recommendations

title: Sustainable Fashion Analytics ‚Äî UCW Capstone
text:
Key Findings

The examination of ecofriendly textile materials and fabrics uncovers a few critical patterns and indicators towards the performance and contribution of the fashion industry.

10% of the worlds gas emissions are contributed by the fashion industry.

Bamboo texture is the foremost cost-effective fabric, especially in rising worldwide markets, where generation costs are lower.
Certifications like GOTS, OEKO-TEX, and Reasonable Exchange are vital for setting up validity and buyer believe, permitting items to command premium costs.
Key markets like France, Brazil, and China appear changing levels of selection, with developing economies looking for cost-effective, locally created economical materials like bamboo fabric and hemp

title: Freshworks CRM Chatbot
text: A custom, AI-driven chatbot integrated into the website of Ozone India Pvt. Ltd.¬†on the Freshworks CRM ecosystem. This solution automates Tier1 customer service and rigorously qualifies leads to optimise sales funnel efficiency.

title: Freshworks CRM Chatbot
text: A custom, AI-driven chatbot integrated into the website of Ozone India Pvt. Ltd.¬†on the Freshworks CRM ecosystem. This solution automates Tier1 customer service and rigorously qualifies leads to optimise sales funnel efficiency.

title: Freshworks CRM Chatbot
text:
Project Details

Client: Ozone India Pvt. Ltd.
Duration: June 2023 - August 2024
Role: Lead Developer & CRM Automation Executive
Status: Deployed, In-active
Team Size: 2 (Developer, CRM Executive + Project Manager)

title: Freshworks CRM Chatbot
text: Snippets (Click to download)

title: Freshworks CRM Chatbot
text:
Features

Intelligent Intent Recognition - Elaborated Natural Language processing (NLP) capabilities that goes beyond simple keyword word matching ability for intent recognition (Example, ‚ÄúI want to return this‚Äù vs.¬†‚ÄúWhere is my order?‚Äù) and accurately assigning the converstation to the right workflow, knowledgebase article or human agent.

Knowledge Base Integration - Dynamically fetches answers from The company‚Äôs (Freshworks and Ozone India Pvt. Ltd.) Knowledge Base(KB) articles to provide accurate and contextually relevant responses to customer queries, providing support 24/7 by accessing and summuriziung relevant articles for common Tier 1 querries.
Customn Scripting - Beyond just lead creation and transfer capabilities, the chatbot has custom scripts that enables it to handle specific transactional querries being able to communicate with RazorPay‚Äôs API‚Äôs to fetch payment status, generate invoices and more.
Personalised Interaction - By leveraging login data and CRM records, the chatbot offers a personalised experience addressing customers by name (giving them option to set the nickname for the customer), recalling past interactions to provide context aware and tailoredresponses based on customer history.

title: Freshworks CRM Chatbot
text:
Challenges

Complex Intent Recognition - Developing an NLP model capable of accurately interpreting diverse customer intents and handling ambiguous queries required extensive training data and fine-tuning.
Solution - Trining the NLP model on a diverse dataset of customer interactions and continuously refining it based on real-world usage to improve accuracy over time.
Integration - Seamlessly integrating the chatbot with Ozone India Pvt. Ltd.¬†website built on a complete custom setup, integration with the third party services (eg., RazorPay) ensuring smooth data flow between the chatbot, CRM, and other third-party services posed significant technical challenges.
Solution - Leveraging Freshworks‚Äô robust API with the company‚Äôs website (to access customer data) and Razorpay (to access order number) capabilities and webhooks to establish secure and efficient communication channels between the chatbot, CRM, and third-party services.

title: Freshworks CRM Chatbot
text:
Tech Stack
Python ¬∑ Freshworks APIs ¬∑ NLP ¬∑ Webhooks ¬∑ Postman ¬∑ JSON

title: Freshworks CRM Chatbot
text:
Impact

Reduced Tier 1 support load by over 60% and improved lead response time immediately upon deployment.
Average Resolution Time for Tier 1 queries decreased from 15 minutes to under 2 minutes.
Improved and Increased the volume of *sales-qualified leads8 ROUTED TO SALES TEAM by 45% within the first quarter post-implementation.

title: WatchFolder ‚Äî Automated File Processing System
text: A desktop-based Python application designed to automate file tracking and event logging across media production servers. The system monitors specified directories for file creation, modification, or deletion in real time, maintaining a complete audit trail for accountability. It also integrates email notification alerts to inform administrators of critical file changes or missing assets.
